title: Peter Kay moved to tears in live comeback as tour kicks off in Manchester
description: The Bolton comedian makes a triumphant return in the first date of his first tour for 12 years.

title: World Cup 2022: Brazil fans bring colour and noise to Lusail Stadium despite loss to Cameroon
description: As Brazil fever hits Lusail Stadium in Doha, BBC Sport travels to their group finale against Cameroon with their thousands of fans.

title: World Cup 2022: Who made your group stage XI and who ranked best?
description: We asked you to rank the players in every World Cup group stage game, here is your best XI and the standout individual performers.

title: World Cup 2022: Serbia 2-3 Switzerland - Swiss through after exciting victory
description: Switzerland seal their place in the World Cup last 16 following an entertaining five-goal victory over Serbia to round off the group stage.

title: World Cup 2022: Vincent Aboubakar scores late winner against Brazil
description: Vincent Aboubakar scores a late winner against Brazil for Cameroon to claim historic 1-0 win but his goal is not enough to send them through and he gets sent off for removing his short in the goal celebration.

title: World Cup 2022 - Cameroon 1-0 Brazil: Cameroon out despite win over Brazil
description: Cameroon are out of the World Cup despite securing a dramatic victory over Brazil at Lusail Stadium in their final Group G match.

title: Brit nominee Pa Salieu jailed for Coventry violent disorder
description: Brit nominee Pa Salieu attacked a man in Coventry shortly after his best friend was stabbed to death.

title: World Cup 2022: Ecstasy and agony as South Korea progress at Uruguay's expense on another dramatic day
description: South Korea's players are overwhelmed with joy, while Luis Suarez and Uruguay cried tears of disbelief following a dramatic conclusion to Group H.

title: World Cup 2022: Best action as Luis Suarez goes through all the emotions against Ghana
description: Twelver years on from their controversial meeting in South Africa, Luis Suarez once again stole the show as Ghana took on Uruguay at the World Cup.

title: Ukraine war: EU set to approve cap on price of Russian oil
description: The European Union agrees a cap of $60 a barrel on exported Russian crude, after Poland gave its backing.

title: World Cup 2022: How to take a penalty in a shootout
description: BBC Sport and Opta analyse the 279 World Cup shootout penalties to see the best ways to score your kick.

title: Tyson Fury v Derek Chisora: Reigning WBC champion weighs in heavier for title bout

title: World Cup 2022: Why fitness is as important as quality at this World Cup - Danny Murphy
description: Danny Murphy says work-rate and athleticism are becoming as decisive as technical ability, and explains why he expects fewer surprise results from now on.

title: World Cup 2022: Otto Addo resigns as Ghana boss after elimination

title: Prince William to meet US President Joe Biden ahead of climate prize

title: Finland's Sanna Marin says Europe would be in trouble without US

title: World Cup 2022: South Korea 2-1 Portugal: Late Hwang Hee-chan goal sends South Korea into last 16
